meanings.sent1: The nongrowth of the plant concerned the gardener.
meanings.sent2: The company's nongrowth led to financial difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The nongrowth of the cake batter surprised the baker.
meanings.sent4: The nongrowth in the savings account was disappointing.
meanings.sent5: The nongrowth of the snowball made it melt quickly.

meanings.definition: A lack of increase or expansion.
meanings.sent1: The nongrowth of the city's population was concerning.
meanings.sent2: The nongrowth of the business was attributed to poor management.
meanings.sent3: The nongrowth of the balloon made it easy to handle.
meanings.sent4: The nongrowth in the project's scope limited its impact.
meanings.sent5: The nongrowth of the balloon's size surprised the children.
